channel.title: LaTeX on Muhammad Yaseen
channel.description: Recent content in LaTeX on Muhammad Yaseen

item.title: Help
item.description:
This is not a help service for all your Statistics, R, Python and/or LaTeX questions, so please don’t post questions in the comments, or send them to me by email.

If you have questions about Statistics and/or data analysis, ask for help on crossvalidated.com.

If you have questions about R, ask for help on stackoverflow.com.

If you have questions about Python, ask for help on stackoverflow.com.

If you have questions about LaTeX, ask for help on stackoverflow.com.

If you think you have found a bug in one of my R packages, report it on github.

item.title: About myaseen208
item.description: This is my blog site where I will put my thoughts about Statistics, R, Python, LaTeX and Research.
